dmca.title: Spanish company complains of defamatory material in Google search
dmca.body:
[redacted]

We request the suppression of the specified URL because we have found some offending pages with our Google search results about our company. We have found it on Google's search "revelance":
1. The Google website where the information above appears: Google.es, Spanish 
2. Identify our country of residence and citizenship: Espana
3. Identify precisely the information that you claim violates your rights under applicable law (the "Unlawful Material"). Some information contained in the forums:

[redacted]
